mapper.insert: insert into review( hugino, id, sikid, stadium, htitle, hcontents, star, hdate) values((select nvl(max(hugino),0)+1 from review), #{id}, #{sikid}, #{stadium}, #{htitle}, #{hcontents}, #{star}, sysdate)
mapper.select:
select count(*) from review r inner join member m on r.id = m.id inner join sikdang s on r.sikid = s.sikid
s.sikname like '%'||#{word}||'%'
m.nick like '%'||#{word}||'%'
htitle like '%'||#{word}||'%'
hcontents like '%'||#{word}||'%'
htitle like '%'||#{word}||'%' or hcontents like '%'||#{word}||'%'

select hugino, nick, sikid, sikname, sikurl, stadium, htitle, hcontents, star, hdate, r from ( select hugino, nick, sikid, sikname, sikurl, stadium, htitle, hcontents, star, hdate, rownum r from ( select hugino, m.nick nick, review.sikid sikid, s.sikname sikname, s.sikurl sikurl, stadium, htitle, hcontents, star, hdate from review inner join member m on review.id = m.id inner join sikdang s on review.sikid = s.sikid
s.sikname like '%'||#{word}||'%'
m.nick like '%'||#{word}||'%'
htitle like '%'||#{word}||'%'
hcontents like '%'||#{word}||'%'
htitle like '%'||#{word}||'%' or hcontents like '%'||#{word}||'%'
order by hugino desc )
)where r >= #{sno} and r <= #{eno}

select hugino, m.nick nick, review.sikid sikid, s.sikname sikname, s.sikurl sikurl, stadium, htitle, hcontents, star, hdate, review.id id from review inner join member m on review.id = m.id inner join sikdang s on review.sikid = s.sikid where hugino = #{hugino}
